unnormalised: The FY24 budget allocated Rs. 2.5 lakh crore to infrastructure development, a 15% increase from the revised estimates of FY23. Detailed expenditure reports can be accessed on pg. 47 of the document.
normalised: The F-Y-twenty four budget allocated rupees two point five lakh crore to infrastructure development, a fifteen percent increase from the revised estimates of F-Y-twenty three. Detailed expenditure reports can be accessed on page forty seven of the document.
